case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_address_found_1: Top Peak of Little Dragoon Mountains
case_circumstances: Skeletal remains found by hiker at peak of Little Dragoon Mountains. The majority of skeletal elements were found at the base of steep rock formation/cliff with others found spread over an area of approximately 100 feet. Deceased dressed in Levi's and blue Western style shirt, no identification. Mandible recovered with most teeth intact. Other teeth found by digging/scraping in area at base of cliff. Unable to determine cause of death or identity, speculation is that he fell off of the cliff.
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Blue jeans (Wrangler size 32 x 34), multicolored (blue and green) western style shirt, green bandanna,  leather belt, white metal belt buckle.
case_other_items_with_body: comb, pen, toothbrush, 32 cents in change (dates on coins range from 1974-1980).
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
